{{Description|This ancient blessed altar is filled with monsters that fear pure, brute force.<br />You shall earn priceless Artifacts, if — and only if — you can pass the trial.}}
'''Valley of Remembrance''' is a [[Domain]] located between [[Dawn Winery]] and [[Dragonspine]] in [[Mondstadt]]. Clearing this domain gives [[Artifacts]]. Challenge domains with higher levels to get better rewards.

==Ley Line Disorder==
The following Ley Line Disorders are applied in this domain:
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;"
!Level
!Ley Line Disorder
|-
!I - V
|[[Physical]] DMG dealt by all party members increased by 75%.
|}

==Challenge Features==
Each level in this domain has the following Challenge Features:
{| class="wikitable"
!Level
!Challenge Features
|-
!IV - V
|· The opponents in this challenge have decreased Physical RES. Use characters who excel in dealing Physical DMG to decrease challenge difficulty.
|}
